data_table.description: Subject ID, sample ID, sample source, source sample ID, and sample use variable associated with participants with primary breast cancer and involved in the "Study on longer adjuvant chemotherapy in Women with Early Breast Cancer" project.

variable.name: SOURCE_SAMPLE_ID
variable.description: Sample ID used in the Source Repository

variable.name: SAMPLE_USE
variable.value: SNP genotypes obtained using standard or custom microarrays
